1: וַיֹּ֣סֶף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>again</n> אִ֭יּוֹב <sup>347 </sup> <n>Moreover Job</n> שְׂאֵ֥ת <sup>5375 </sup> <n>took</n> מְשָׁל֗וֹ <sup>4912 </sup> <n>his parable</n> וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n>
2: מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Oh</n> יִתְּנֵ֥נִי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Oh that</n> כְיַרְחֵי־ <sup>3391 </sup> <n>I were as [in] months</n> קֶ֑דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>past</n> כִּ֝ימֵ֗י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>as [in] the days</n> אֱל֣וֹהַּ <sup>433 </sup> <n>[when] God</n> יִשְׁמְרֵֽנִי׃ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>preserved</n>
3: בְּהִלּ֣וֹ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>shined</n> נֵ֭רוֹ <sup>5216 </sup> <n>When his candle</n> עֲלֵ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רֹאשִׁ֑י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon my head</n> לְ֝אוֹרוֹ <sup>216 </sup> <n>[and when] by his light</n> אֵ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walked</n> חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>[through] darkness</n>
4: כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> הָ֭יִיתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בִּימֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>As I was in the days</n> חָרְפִּ֑י <sup>2779 </sup> <n>of my youth</n> בְּס֥וֹד <sup>5475 </sup> <n>when the secret</n> אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַּ <sup>433 </sup> <n>of God</n> עֲלֵ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אָהֳלִֽי׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>[was] upon my tabernacle</n>
5: בְּע֣וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>was yet</n> שַׁ֭דַּי <sup>7706 </sup> <n>When the Almighty</n> עִמָּדִ֑י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>against</n> סְבִ֖יבוֹתַ֣י <sup>5439 </sup> <n>[were] about</n> נְעָרָֽי׃ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>[was] yet with me [when] my children</n>
6: בִּרְחֹ֣ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>When I washed</n> הֲלִיכַ֣י <sup>1978 </sup> <n>my steps</n> בְּחֵמָ֑ה <sup>2529 </sup> <n>with butter</n> וְצ֥וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>and the rock</n> יָצ֥וּק <sup>6694 </sup> <n>poured me out</n> עִ֝מָּדִ֗י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>me</n> פַּלְגֵי־ <sup>6388 </sup> <n>rivers</n> שָֽׁמֶן׃ <sup>8081 </sup> <n>of oil</n>
7: בְּצֵ֣אתִי <sup>3318 </sup> <n>When I went out</n> שַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>to the gate</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>of</n> קָ֑רֶת <sup>7176 </sup> <n>through the city</n> בָּ֝רְח֗וֹב <sup>7339 </sup> <n>in the street</n> אָכִ֥ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>[when] I prepared</n> מוֹשָׁבִֽי׃ <sup>4186 </sup> <n>my seat</n>
8: רָא֣וּנִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> נְעָרִ֣ים <sup>5288 </sup> <n>The young men</n> וְנֶחְבָּ֑אוּ <sup>2244 </sup> <n>me and hid</n> וִֽ֝ישִׁישִׁים <sup>3453 </sup> <n>themselves and the aged</n> קָ֣מוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>arose</n> עָמָֽדוּ׃ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>[and] stood up</n>
9: שָׂ֭רִים <sup>8269 </sup> <n>The princes</n> עָצְר֣וּ <sup>6113 </sup> <n>refrained</n> בְמִלִּ֑ים <sup>4405 </sup> <n>talking</n> וְ֝כַ֗ף <sup>3709 </sup> <n>[their] hand</n> יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and laid</n> לְפִיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>on their mouth</n>
10: קוֹל־ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>their peace</n> נְגִידִ֥ים <sup>5057 </sup> <n>The nobles</n> נֶחְבָּ֑אוּ <sup>2244 </sup> <n>held</n> וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>and their tongue</n> לְחִכָּ֥ם <sup>2441 </sup> <n>to the roof of their mouth</n> דָּבֵֽקָה׃ <sup>1692 </sup> <n>cleaved</n>
11: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> אֹ֣זֶן <sup>241 </sup> <n>When the ear</n> שָׁ֭מְעָה <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> וַֽתְּאַשְּׁרֵ֑נִי <sup>833 </sup> <n>[me] then it blessed</n> וְעַ֥יִן <sup>5869 </sup> <n>me and when the eye</n> רָ֝אֲתָ֗ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> וַתְּעִידֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5749 </sup> <n>[me] it gave witness</n>
12: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> אֲ֭מַלֵּט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>Because I delivered</n> עָנִ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>the poor</n> מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <sup>7768 </sup> <n>that cried</n> וְ֝יָת֗וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>and the fatherless</n> וְֽלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>had no</n> עֹזֵ֥ר <sup>5826 </sup> <n>and [him that had] none to help</n> לֽוֹ׃
13: בִּרְכַּ֣ת <sup>1293 </sup> <n>The blessing</n> אֹ֭בֵד <sup>6 </sup> <n>of him that was ready to perish</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תָּבֹ֑א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> וְלֵ֖ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>heart</n> אַלְמָנָ֣ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>upon me and I caused the widow's</n> אַרְנִֽן׃ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>to sing for joy</n>
14: צֶ֣דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>on righteousness</n> לָ֭בַשְׁתִּי <sup>3847 </sup> <n>I put</n> וַיִּלְבָּשֵׁ֑נִי <sup>3847 </sup> <n>and it clothed</n> כִּמְעִ֥יל <sup>4598 </sup> <n>[was] as a robe</n> וְ֝צָנִ֗יף <sup>6797 </sup> <n>and a diadem</n> מִשְׁפָּטִֽי׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>me my judgment</n>
15: עֵינַ֣יִם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>I was eyes</n> הָ֭יִיתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לַֽעִוֵּ֑ר <sup>5787 </sup> <n>to the blind</n> וְרַגְלַ֖יִם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>and feet</n> לַפִּסֵּ֣חַ <sup>6455 </sup> <n>[was] I to the lame</n> אָֽנִי׃ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n>
16: אָ֣ב <sup>1 </sup> <n>I [was] a father</n> אָ֭נֹכִֽי <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> לָֽאֶבְיוֹנִ֑ים <sup>34 </sup> <n>to the poor</n> וְרִ֖ב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>and the cause</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדַ֣עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[which] I knew</n> אֶחְקְרֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>2713 </sup> <n>not I searched out</n>
17: וָֽ֭אֲשַׁבְּרָה <sup>7665 </sup> <n>And I brake</n> מְתַלְּע֣וֹת <sup>4973 </sup> <n>the jaws</n> עַוָּ֑ל <sup>5767 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> וּ֝מִשִּׁנָּ֗יו <sup>8127 </sup> <n>out of his teeth</n> אַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>and plucked</n> טָֽרֶף׃ <sup>2964 </sup> <n>the spoil</n>
18: וָ֭אֹמַר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then I said</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>in</n> קִנִּ֣י <sup>7064 </sup> <n>in my nest</n> אֶגְוָ֑ע <sup>1478 </sup> <n>I shall die</n> וְ֝כַח֗וֹל <sup>2344 </sup> <n>as the sand</n> אַרְבֶּ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and I shall multiply</n> יָמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[my] days</n>
19: שָׁרְשִׁ֣י <sup>8328 </sup> <n>My root</n> פָת֣וּחַ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>[was] spread out</n> אֱלֵי־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מָ֑יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>by the waters</n> וְ֝טַ֗ל <sup>2919 </sup> <n>and the dew</n> יָלִ֥ין <sup>3885 </sup> <n>lay all night</n> בִּקְצִירִֽי׃ <sup>7105 </sup> <n>upon my branch</n>
20: כְּ֭בוֹדִי <sup>3519 </sup> <n>My glory</n> חָדָ֣שׁ <sup>2319 </sup> <n>[was] fresh</n> עִמָּדִ֑י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>in me</n> וְ֝קַשְׁתִּ֗י <sup>7198 </sup> <n>and my bow</n> בְּיָדִ֥י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in my hand</n> תַחֲלִֽיף׃ <sup>2498 </sup> <n>was renewed</n>
21: לִֽי־ שָׁמְע֥וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Unto me [men] gave ear</n> וְיִחֵ֑לּוּ <sup>3176 </sup> <n>and waited</n> וְ֝יִדְּמ֗וּ <sup>1826 </sup> <n>and kept silence</n> לְמ֣וֹ <sup>3926 </sup> <n>at</n> עֲצָתִֽי׃ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>my counsel</n>
22: אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>After</n> דְ֭בָרִי <sup>1697 </sup> <n>my words</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יִשְׁנ֑וּ <sup>8138 </sup> <n>they spake not again</n> וְ֝עָלֵ֗ימוֹ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תִּטֹּ֥ף <sup>5197 </sup> <n>dropped</n> מִלָּתִֽי׃ <sup>4405 </sup> <n>and my speech</n>
23: וְיִֽחֲל֣וּ <sup>3176 </sup> <n>And they waited</n> כַמָּטָ֣ר <sup>4306 </sup> <n>for me as for the rain</n> לִ֑י וּ֝פִיהֶ֗ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>their mouth</n> פָּעֲר֥וּ <sup>6473 </sup> <n>and they opened</n> לְמַלְקֽוֹשׁ׃ <sup>4456 </sup> <n>wide [as] for the latter rain</n>
24: אֶשְׂחַ֣ק <sup>7832 </sup> <n>[If] I laughed</n> אֲ֭לֵהֶם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יַאֲמִ֑ינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>on them they believed</n> וְא֥וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>[it] not and the light</n> פָּ֝נַ֗י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of my countenance</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יַפִּילֽוּן׃ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>they cast not down</n>
25: אֶֽבֲחַ֣ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>I chose</n> דַּרְכָּם֮ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>out their way</n> וְאֵשֵׁ֪ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and sat</n> רֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>chief</n> וְ֭אֶשְׁכּוֹן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>and dwelt</n> כְּמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>as a king</n> בַּגְּד֑וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>in the army</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אֲבֵלִ֣ים <sup>57 </sup> <n>the mourners</n> יְנַחֵֽם׃ <sup>5162 </sup> <n>as one [that] comforteth</n>
